properties.description: Connection to your data destination store.
Connection to your data source store.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TripFaresSQL
TripDataCSV, TripFaresSQL join(TripDataCSV@medallion == TripFaresSQL@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == TripFaresSQL@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == TripFaresSQL@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == TripFaresSQL@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> InnerJoinWithTripFares
InnerJoinWithTripFares aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	average_fare = avg(toInteger(total_amount)),
		total_trip_distance = sum(toInteger(trip_distance))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType
AggregateByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLDWsink

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AggregateComedyRatings = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
AggregateComedyRatings sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

properties.description: This is a generalized Slowly Changing Dimension Type 1 that is parameterized to work against different dimension tables and dimension types.

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dimname as string ('dimprods'),
	keycol as string ('ProductNumber'),
	SurrogateKey as string ('ProductID'),
	tablename as string ('DimProducts')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> NewMembers1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingMembers
source(output(
		maxsk as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('select max(',$SurrogateKey,') as maxsk from ',$tablename)),
	format: 'query') ~> SetMaxKey
NewMembers1 derive(businesskey1 = toString(byPosition(2)),
		name1 = toString(byPosition(6))) ~> PickCols1
ExistingMembers derive(each(match(instr(name,'ID')>0), 'surrogatekey2' = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(instr(name,'Number')>0), 'businesskey2' = toString($$))) ~> PickCols2
PickCols1, MapDrifted1 lookup(businesskey1 == businesskey2,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
isMatching split(match,
	disjoint: false) ~> checkMatch@(isMatch, noMatch)
checkMatch@isMatch derive({_LastUpdated} = currentTimestamp(),
		DWhash = sha2(256,name1)) ~> UpdateSetAttrs
PickCols2 derive(ProductID = toInteger(byName('ProductID')),
		Name = toString(byName('Name')),
		ProductNumber = toString(byName('ProductNumber')),
		Color = toString(byName('Color')),
		StandardCost = toDecimal(byName('StandardCost')),
		ListPrice = toDecimal(byName('ListPrice')),
		{_Inserted} = toTimestamp(byName('_Inserted')),
		{_LastUpdated} = toTimestamp(byName('_LastUpdated')),
		DWhash = toString(byName('DWhash')),
		surrogatekey2 = toInteger(byName('surrogatekey2')),
		businesskey2 = toString(byName('businesskey2'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Lookup1 derive(match = isMatch()) ~> isMatching
UpdateSetAttrs alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
checkMatch@noMatch keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey2 as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Join1 derive(surrogatekey2 = surrogatekey2 + maxsk,
		{_LastUpdated} = currentTimestamp(),
		{_Inserted} = currentTimestamp(),
		DWhash = sha2(256,name1)) ~> InsertSetAttrs
SurrogateKey1, SetMaxKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
InsertSetAttrs select(mapColumn(
		Name = name1,
		{_Inserted},
		{_LastUpdated},
		each(match(name=='surrogatekey2'),
			$SurrogateKey+'' = $$),
		each(match(name=='businesskey1'),
			$keycol+'' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SetCols
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($keycol)],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*[^_]$`))
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
SetCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> sink2

properties.description: Connection to your source data store.
Connection to your destination data store.
Scan the file path on your source storage store and get the container list.

activities.name: ForEachContainer
activities.description: Get the container list from Metadata activity and then iterates each of them to Copy activity.

activities.name: CopyOneContainer
activities.description: Copy each container from source storage store to destination store.
